title: Kadhal Vanthal Solli Anuppu Lyrics
stanzas:
sutta mannile meenaaga
manam vetta veliyilae vaaduthadi
kanneer kalandhu
kanneer kalandhu
kadal neermattam kooduthadi.

uyirai thavira sondhamillaiye
kadhalikkum munbu
indha ulagae endhan
sondhamanathe kadhal
vandha pinbu.

saavai azhaithu
kaditham potten
kadhalikkum munbu.
oru saavai pudhaikka
sakthi kaetkiren
kadhal vandha pinbu.

unnaal en kadal alai
urangave illai.
unnaal en nilavukku
udal nalam illai.

kadal thuyil kolvadhum
nila gunam kolvadhum
naan uyir vazhvadhum
un sollil ullathadi.

pirandha mannai
allithindren unnai
kaanum munbu.
nee nadantha mannai
allithindren unnai
kanda pinbu.

annai thandhai kandathillai
naan kanthirandha pinbu.
en aththanai uravum
moththam kanden
unnai kanda pinbu.

penne en payanamo
thodangave illai.
adharkkum adhu mudivathaa
vilangave illai.

nan karai aavadhum
illai nurai aavadhum
valarpirari aavadhum
un sollil ullathadi.

Kadhal vandhal
solli anuppu
Kadhal vandhal
solli anuppu
solli anuppu
solli anuppu
